◆ Triplet()

int gft::Color::Triplet ( int  a,
int  b,
int  c 
)

Converts a color to hexadecimal format (a hex triplet).

The hex triplet is formed by concatenating three bytes of color channels (24-bit color scheme). A hex triplet corresponds to a six-digit hexadecimal number.

◆ YCbCr2RGB()
